name: Cactusses (Cactussi?) [Tumblr dash theme]
description: Tumblr dashboard theme with custom 'new post' icons. "At Dynevor there ought to be none of the modern parvenu flowers, such as dahlias, cactusses, chrysanthemums, and calceolarias, all distinguished foreigners, newly imported, and generally received with ecstasies of admiration; but in an old Welsh scene, we expect to find only the native families of lilies and ham-hocks." *
additional_info:
'New post' icons only: style 90298


From style 33767 by user 57010.
